fields.summary: KAFKA-15665 prevents safe reassignments from completing
fields.description:
The implementation for KAFKA-15665 is a little too strict - it requires that all replicas in the target replica set be in ISR.

This means if we have a reassignment like [1, 2, 3] -> [2, 3, 4] where broker 2 was unhealthy and lagging in replication, reassignment would not complete. 

 

I believe it should work to instead just check the following:

- Added replicas are in ISR (newTargetISR)
- Resulting ISR (newTargetISR) is not under-min-isr
